EmailTemplate.subject: NRF 2022: See you next week in New York
EmailTemplate.textOnly: Simple, made possible. Move beyond retail complexity so your stores can really move NRF 2022 | New York | 16-18 January 2022 | NCR Booth 4819 Ready to see what’s in store for this year? With NRF 2022 just a couple of days away, we’re eager to share the innovations that can simplify your store operations. At Booth 4819, we’ll be sharing how our open platform gives you a full set of tools to serve your customers from online to in-store. Come interact with our advanced retail technology and see the services that prepare retailers to grow along with the industry. Before you arrive in New York, take a minute to schedule a one-on-one meeting <[[https://www.ncr.com/retail/nrf-2022]]> with a member of our team to talk about how you can simplify your operations and get the edge on your competitors.
